meanings.sent1: She rooses her friend for being so kind.
meanings.sent2: He always rooses his sister for her artistic talents.
meanings.sent3: The teacher rooses the student for their excellent presentation.
meanings.sent4: The coach rooses the team for their hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The mayor rooses the volunteers for their selfless service to the community.

meanings.sent1: He rooses about his new car to everyone he meets.
meanings.sent2: She constantly rooses about her achievements at work.
meanings.sent3: The peacock rooses about its colorful feathers.
meanings.sent4: The child rooses about winning the game.
meanings.sent5: The actor rooses about the success of his latest movie.

meanings.sent1: The company rooses their new product with a big marketing campaign.
meanings.sent2: She rooses the charity event to raise awareness.
meanings.sent3: The politician rooses the new policy to gain public support.
meanings.sent4: The teacher rooses the importance of education to her students.
meanings.sent5: The organization rooses environmental conservation efforts in the community.
